vars <- colnames(interest_vars)
dat <- as.data.frame(interest_vars)

catcorrm <- function(vars, dat) sapply(vars, function(y) sapply(vars, function(x) assocstats(table(dat[,x], dat[,y]))$cramer))

heatmap(catcorrm(vars,dat))
